context: The word 'lõpp' is an Estonian noun that means 'end', 'finish', or 'conclusion'. It can refer to the end of a period of time, event, story, process, or sequence. In Estonian grammar, it's in the nominative singular form here. When declined for different cases (genitive, partitive, etc.), it would change slightly - e.g., lõpu (genitive), lõppu (partitive).
